Class javachart.chart.HiLoAxis 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----javachart.chart.Axis
           |
           +----javachart.chart.HiLoAxis
public class HiLoAxis
extends Axis
implements AxisInterface
Extends Axis to change the way scaling is calculated. This class considers the minimum y2 values of each Dataset rather than just the minimum x or y

getMinValsFromData(int)
returns a minimum value for Datasets managed on this Axis.

getMinValsFromData 
  protected double getMinValsFromData(int nmsets)
returns a minimum value for Datasets managed on this Axis. Overrides Axis to consider Y2 values rather than Y values.
Parameters:
nmsets - number of datasets in use
Overrides:
getMinValsFromData in class Axis
